name: F.F.
info: A Stand User from another world, Attack Speed increased by X%.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Immortal Spirit
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: New Exclusive Ultimate [Immortal Spirit]. F.F. splits into [Colony Form] to assist in battle. [Colony Form] inherits (80% / 100% / 120%) of F.F.’s Max HP, (60% / 80% / 100%) Attack, (160% / 180% / 200%) DEF and RES, and can block 1 enemy, lasting for the entire battle. [Immortal Spirit] can only be used once per battle.

maniaIntensify.title: Meteorology Teammate
maniaIntensify.text: When Weather Report is on-field, F.F. recovers 2% Max HP every second, as well as 1 energy every second.

shackles.title: Obedient Guard
shackles.description: [Parasitic Bullet] receives additional effects: DMG Dealt to the enemy increased by 12% and DMG taken for alled units reduced by 12%, lasting for 6 seconds.

shackles.title: Spiritual Wisdom
shackles.description: [Parasitic Bullet] receives an additional effect: [Plankton Colony] will have Attack Speed increased by 75% for 6 seconds after getting shot at.

skills.name: Plankton Colony
skills.description: F.F. fires plankton from within her body as bullets, each hit dealing (Attack * 77%) Physical Damage.

skills.name: Parasitic Bullet
skills.description:
[Parasitic Bullet] F.F. fires a parasitic bullet, dealing (Attack * 185%) Physical Damage to all enemies within a single grid. Using this Ultimate does not consume energy. After using this Ultimate 3 times, this ability switches to [Hydration].

[Hydration] (40 EP): F.F. replenishes her water. After using this Ultimate, this ability switches to [Parasitic Bullet].

skills.name: Regeneration
skills.description: [Parasitic Bullet] also restores (Attack * 113%) HP to all allies within the single grid.

skills.name: Foo Fighters
skills.description: All effects of [Parasitic Bullet] are increased by 10%.

upgrade.description: The effect bonus is increased to $0%.

criminalRecord: A new lifeform that gained "intellect" from the Whitesnake's DISC. Unable to survive without water, but able to move on land by mimicking the appearance of a human.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
The subject's ability is [Foo Fighters]. The subject is able to control plankton, and through this ability is able to parasitize and take over a human body, then destroy it from the inside. Due to the characteristics of plankton such as being able to morph into different shapes, divide, and regenerate etc, the subject is able to parasitize multiple bodies at once, transform limbs into gun barrels when attacking, and fire plankton as bullets. When a companion is injured, the subject is also able to seal and plug up wounds.
ecbFlavourText:
"This is my spirit, this is my intellect!"
"I was alive!"
